metadata.title: CVE-2015-4469 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The chmd_read_headers function in chmd.c in libmspack before 0.5 does notvalidate name lengths, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted CHM file.

criterions.comment: libmspack package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
